title: TikTok CEO Refuses to Say Whether CCP Has Persecuted Uyghurs
description: TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew prepares to testify before the House Energy and Commerce Committee in the Rayburn House Office Building on Capitol Hill in Washington, on March 23, 2023. (Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images)

title: White House on TikTok CEO Testimony: US Has ‘Legitimate Concerns’ About App on National Security
description: National Security Council Coordinator for Strategic Communications John Kirby speaks during the daily briefing in the Brady Press Briefing Room of the White House in Washington, on March 22, 2023. (Saul Loeb/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Google Launches ChatGPT Rival Called ‘Bard’ For testing in US and UK
description: The logo for Google LLC at the Google Store Chelsea in Manhattan, New York City, on Nov. 17, 2021. (Andrew Kelly/Reuters)
